title: Drop-off Waterfall Analysis
insights:
Analysis of User Drop-off and Abandonment Patterns in the Bus Ticket Booking App

The dataset contains a total of 44,031 events recorded from 499 users between December 24, 2025, and January 20, 2026. The analysis focuses on user drop-off at various stages of the booking flow.

Drop-off Analysis

The computed drop-offs between stages are as follows:

  • App Start to Search: 95 users lost (19.8%)
  • Search to Results: 5 users lost (1.3%)
  • Results to Seat Selection: 173 users lost (45.6%)
  • Seat Selection to Payment Initiation: 170 users lost (82.5%)
  • Payment Initiation to Payment Success: 27 users lost (75.0%)

WORST TRANSITION

The worst transition occurs between Seat Selection and Payment Initiation, where 170 users were lost, representing a drop-off rate of 82.5%.

REVENUE IMPACT

Estimating potential bookings lost at the worst transition (Seat Selection to Payment Initiation), if we assume each booking is worth an average of $50, the revenue impact can be calculated as follows:

Potential bookings lost: 170 users * $50 = $8,500.

ROOT CAUSES

Possible UX/technical reasons for the high drop-off at the Seat Selection stage include:

  • Complexity in Seat Selection: Users may find the seat selection interface confusing or cumbersome, leading to frustration.
  • Technical Issues: There may be performance issues or bugs that prevent users from completing the seat selection process smoothly.
  • Lack of Clear Information: Insufficient information about seat options or pricing may deter users from proceeding to payment.

FIXES

To address the high drop-off rate, the following UX improvements are recommended, ranked by expected impact:

  • Simplify the Seat Selection Interface: Redesign the interface to make it more intuitive and user-friendly, reducing complexity.
  • Enhance Performance and Stability: Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix any technical issues that may hinder the seat selection process.
  • Provide Clear Information: Ensure that users have access to detailed information about seat options, including pricing and amenities, to facilitate informed decision-making.
